title: Language Proficiency Improvement Program Utilizing Learning Strategy Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and awareness of learning strategies
context.additional_context: Weekly submission of learning journals with differentiated feedback based on professional competency levels.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three effective learning strategies within one month and apply them contextually.
Learners can revise learning strategies based on self-reflections recorded in learning journals after three months.
Learners achieve an intermediate or higher level in language proficiency assessments upon completing the six-month course.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
